summary: DT*:  THE CONTACT STATED WHILE DRIVING AT VARIOUS SPEEDS ON SEVERAL OCCASIONS THE VEHICLE STALLED.  THE VEHICLE WAS MANEUVERED OFF THE ROAD WITHOUT INCIDENT AND RESTARTED AFTER A FEW MINUTES.  THE VEHICLE WAS DRIVEN TO THE DEALER WHERE THE CAM POSITION SENSOR WAS REPLACED.  THE PROBLEM HAS NOT REOCCURRED.
